desc: A Python-based web application leveraging Flask, OpenCV, and YOLO for real-time object detection and counting. Designed for inventory management and live tracking, it processes live video feeds, excludes human detection, and boosts operational efficiency.

name: Automated Code Base Linter
desc: A Python-based tool employing Flake8 to ensure code quality by automating linting tasks, integrated with user account management for enhanced security.

name: Train Reservation System
desc: A C-based application that facilitates train ticket booking, seat management, and fare calculation, offering a streamlined reservation process.

name: Banking System
desc: A native Android application built using Java and XML. This app provides basic banking functionalities such as account management, transaction tracking, and fund transfers.
